title: Almighty Game Designer - Novel Updates
tags: Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Nationalism   Parallel Worlds   Poor to Rich   Power Couple   Previous Life Talent   Romantic Subplot   Transported to Another World   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Qing Shan Qu Zui   青衫取醉
description:
Chen Mo a game designer got sent to a parallel world with advance technology but undeveloped game concepts.

Watch as he redefines the world’s gaming industry with the games he remade from his old world.>
